name: Fly High (itch) (zaio)
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 99: Birds

You have only one objective: keep moving to dodge obstacles for as long as you can.

Controls:

Left and Right arrows to move sideways

Space to jump

R to quickly restart the game (on game end screen)

Gameplay:

Jump repeatedly to go higher, as falling too low will result in a loss.

Collect gems to increase your score.

Going outside the vertical bounds will move the player to the other side of the screen.

The longer you fly, the faster the obstacles. Be careful!
